turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good evening. I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks on South Main Street in Weatherford, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chestnut praline latte, and I'd like that tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but can I have whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One moment while I place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have ordered you a tall chestnut praline latte with whipped cream and no milk to be picked up at the Starbucks on south main street in Weatherford Texas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are amazing. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You as well, enjoy your coffee.
